alert.note: Alert for Palo Pinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 11 at 9:53PM CDT until May 11 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL PALO PINTO COUNTY... At 952 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 7 miles southwest of Mineral Wells, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Mineral Wells around 1015 PM CDT. On its present path, the circulation will cross Highway 281 south of Mineral Wells. The hail core will be to the north, likely impacting the city of Mineral Wells. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
